item.title: AI Product Ideas 2025
item.author: hari@dasarpai.com (Hari Thapliyaal)
item.description:
AI Product Ideas

Introduction

There is a flood of AI products in the market, yet some people are still searching for ideas to get started. The following list of ideas can serve as a good starting point for beginners, and even if you are already established, you may find some of these ideas inspiring.

Many of these ideas are available either as features of larger products or as standalone solutions. For example, they may exist as features in generic products like Google Drive, OneDrive, Outlook, or Office 365, or as part of domain-specific products such as Pharma Research tools, Banking CRMs, Loan Processing systems, or Project Requirement Management platforms.

item.title: Top 10 Technologies of Future
item.author: hari@dasarpai.com (Hari Thapliyaal)
item.description:
Top 10 Technologies of Future

Augmented Reality :

Helps surgeons see inside their patients
Help workers operating in dangerous conditions

Lab-Grown Meat: To save the environment

Address the ethical issues raised by industrial farming

Quantum Computers:

Using quantum mechanics to make calculations. These computers are many thousand times faster than our todayâ€™s computers.

Plasmonic Materials: Light controlled nanomaterial

Cure invisible cloak, nano-particles to kill cancer.

Super Advance Personal Assitant.

Experts are feeling that you can do ethical debates with digital helpers.
